verbs.description: [ARGM-TMP: In January] , [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: accused] [ARG1: the pharmaceutical industry] [ARG2: of " getting away with murder " with high price increases] , and promised to do something about it . He 's set to share his plan to do so Friday .
